Package index

Scraping Functions

get_browser_links()
Get all user agent detail links for a specific browser
get_useragent_details()
Scrape details from a single user agent page
scrape_browser()
Scrape all user agents for a specific browser
get_all_categories()
Get all available browser/crawler categories from useragentstring.com

Blocking Test Functions

default_test_sites()
Default test sites for blocking analysis
detect_blocking()
Detect if a response indicates blocking
test_user_agent()
Test a single user agent against a URL
test_ua_all_sites()
Test a user agent against multiple sites
calculate_blocking_score()
Calculate blocking score from test results
run_blocking_test()
Run comprehensive blocking test on user agents
